message: MATA will operate a regular schedule on Good Friday, April 15. Administrative offices will be closed.

Route 53 diverted. Stops: N PARKWAY@WALDRAN BLVD, N PARKWAY@BELLEVUE, BELLEVUE@FORREST, BELLEVUE@AUTUMN, BELLEVUE@OVERTON PARK, OVERTON PARK@MONTGOMERY, OVERTON PARK@CLAYBROOK, CLEVELAND@AUTUMN, WATKINS ST@GALLOWAY AVE, N PARKWAY@STONEWALL, N PARKWAY@EVERGREEN, N PARKWAY@HAWTHORNE, N PARKWAY@MC LEAN, N PARKWAY@UNIVERSITY, N PARKWAY@WEST DR, will not be served.
Route 42 Disabled on Holmes at Hudgins
